articles.description: Not all PlayStation Vita developers were told of the store closure. As such, several games are now cancelled while others are being rushed to the finish line.
articles.content: Sony finally confirmed the closure of the PlayStation 3, PSP, and PS Vita stores yesterday. Of the three, the Vita store is staying open the longest, closing on August 27. While Sony told some develo… [+2582 chars]
